headline: United Parcel Service (UPS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on United Parcel Service on Pellom Value Investments’s Substack by Tyler Pellom. As of 1st July, United Parcel Service’s share was trading at $104.74. UPS’s trailing and forward P/E were 15.25 and 14.64 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. United Parcel Service (UPS) has been undergoing a strategic shift under […]

headline: Citi Lifts PT on United Parcel Service (UPS) to $127 from $122, Keeps Buy Rating
summary: United Parcel Service, Inc. (NYSE:UPS) is one of the 10 Cheap Large Cap Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On July 9, Citi analyst Ariel Rosa maintained a Buy rating on United Parcel Service, Inc. (NYSE:UPS), raising the price target to $127 from $122. The analyst told investors that Citi sees balanced risk/rewards associated with transport […]

headline: 3 To Watch Of 23 'Safer' July Dividends From 46 Fortune World's Most Admired Companies
summary: I analyze the 50 Fortune World's Most Admired Companies, focusing on dividend-paying stocks and their yield-based investment potential. View the full analysis here.
